title: JSON-file output: Error writing to file
body:
```
k6 run -o json=basic.json basic.js

```

`basic.js`
```
import { sleep } from 'k6';
import http from 'k6/http';

export let options = {
  stages: [
    {duration: '10s', target: 20},
    {duration: '60s', target: 20},
    {duration: '30s', target: 30},
    {duration: '60s', target: 30}
  ]
};

const url = 'http://...';

export default function() {
  http.get(url);
  sleep(Math.random());
}
```
